Class BookList

  • java.lang.Object
    • BookList

  • public class BookList
extends java.lang.Object
    The BookList class contains methods to store a collection of books,and remove or return number of books. When it adds books to the collection. Those books will also be stored in database.
    Version:
    2017.10.25
    Author:
    Li Tang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BookList()
      Create a BookList.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBooks(Books books)
      Add books to the collection and books will also be saved in database by using GetConnection class.
      java.util.ArrayList<Books> findBook(java.lang.String title)
      Serach books by the title in booklist and add them into a collection
      java.util.ArrayList<Books> findBook2(java.lang.String author)
      Serach books by the author in booklist and add them into a collection
      java.util.ArrayList<Books> findBook3(java.lang.String publisher)
      Serach books by the publisher in booklist and add them into a collection
      java.util.ArrayList<Books> findBook4(java.lang.String publicationdate)
      Serach books by the publicationdate in booklist and add them into a collection
      int getNumberOfBooks()
      return total number of books store in the booklist.
      void removeBook(java.lang.String title)
      use iterator to search booklist, find book with special title and remove it.

      • addBooks

        public void addBooks(Books books)
        Add books to the collection and books will also be saved in database by using GetConnection class.

      • findBook

        public java.util.ArrayList<Books> findBook(java.lang.String title)
        Serach books by the title in booklist and add them into a collection
        Parameters:
        title - serch the title.
        Returns:
        all books with the same title will be return in the returnlist

      • removeBook

        public void removeBook(java.lang.String title)

        Parameters:
